name: Protective Order Motion (Expanded)
description: Comprehensive templates for drafting motions for protective orders including meet and confer, sanctions, and declarations

templates.description: Draft [client name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal argument regarding narrowly tailoring plaintiff's production requests including in deposition notice of [client name] person most knowledgeable.
Draft [client name] regarding meet and confer efforts with plaintiff's counsel.
Draft [client name] sanctions argument in its motion for a protective order regarding plaintiff's deposition categories and productions requests.
Draft declaration included with [client name] motions for a protective order regarding plaintiff's deposition categories and productions requests.
Analyze categories included in plaintiff's deposition notice of Person Most knowledgeable at [client name] to draft a motion for a protective order regarding the same.
Analyze plaintiff's lengthy request for documents included in the deposition notice for Person Most Knowledgeable at [client name] to draft motion for a protective order regarding the same.
Analyze case and statutory law regarding protecting categories noticed by plaintiff regarding [client name] motion for a protective order to draft motions for a protective order regarding the same.

Analyze case and statutory law regarding protecting productions requests noticed by plaintiff regarding [client name] motion for a protective order to draft motions for a protective order regarding the same.
Draft [client name] notice of motion for a protective order regarding deposition categories noticed by plaintiff.
Draft [client name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal authority for protecting deposition categories noticed by plaintiff.
Draft [client name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal authority for protecting production requests included in the deposition notice.
Draft [client name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal argument for mutually agreeable date.
Draft [client name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal argument regarding narrowly tailoring plaintiff deposition categories.

Draft [client name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal argument regarding narrowly tailoring plaintiff's production requests including in deposition notice of [client name] person most knowledgeable.
Draft [client name] regarding meet and confer efforts with plaintiff's counsel.
Draft [client name] sanctions argument in its motion for a protective order regarding plaintiff's deposition categories and productions requests.
Draft declaration included with [client name] motions for a protective order regarding plaintiff's deposition categories and productions requests.
